introBody:
Your Account Key is the most important part of your account.

Please find a private place to set up your key. It takes about five minutes.
postSetupTitle: Your Account Key is Set Up
postSetupBody: If you lose your Account Key, you will lose access to all of your Celo Dollars and Gold. Nobody, not even Celo, will be able to help you recover your account without your key. Store it in a safe place and do not share it.
failedFetchMnemonic: Failed to fetch your Account Key
backupKeyNotification: Without a Backup Key, you may lose access to your wallet.
backupKeySummary: Find a private place and write down your Account Key. Please store it somewhere safe. Do not save it in your phone.
backupPrompt: For the security of your funds, your account is frozen until you get your Backup Key
savedConfirmation: Yes, I have written down my key.
backupQuizWordCount: What's the <0>{{ordinal}}</0> word of your Account Key?
backupQuizFailed: The Account Key you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

backupComplete.1: Next, you can set up Safeguards.

socialBackupIntro.body: Safeguards is an additional layer of protection for your account in case you lose your Backup Key. Once set up, you’ll be able to restore your account with the help of two friends or family members.
socialBackupIntro.warning: NEVER TELL ANYONE YOUR SAFEGUARDS’ IDENTITIES.

socialBackup.body: Share each phrase below with a friend. Be sure to send only one phrase to each person.
socialBackup.confirmation: I have sent each Safeguard phrase to a trusted friend.

backupPhrasePlaceholder: horse leopard dog monkey shark tiger lemur whale squid wolf squirrel mouse lion elephant cat shrimp bear penguin deer turtle fox zebra goat giraffe
